thread.section_title: Lube Mobile Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Lube Mobile | lubemobile.com.au
thread.title: Liz Younger
thread.title_full: Lube Mobile reviewed by Liz Younger

author: Liz Younger
title: Liz Younger
text: Thanks Lubemobile Gold Coast for your prompt service while I was broken down. Morgan was my mechanic, and I must say Morgan was absolutely amazing, at not only diagnosing and fixing the problem but his customer service and professional attitude to his work was simply amazing. What was quite a stressful situation of having a car breakdown was made light by Morgan's welcoming prompt customer service. Thank you Morgan and Lubemobile for your amazing customer service
